COMMAND.NAME: windowssetglobalstatusfield
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: At the bottom of the MDI window there is a global status bar that you can put your own information in. fieldNumber is a relative position (numbered starting from 0) from left to right. width is how wide in pixels the field should be, and string is any text data you want in that field. If width is zero, the field is removed from the status bar.
